masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "Armed robbery in progress at Central Savings. Four hostiles, automatic weapons, 23 hostages including children there to see the holiday decorations. Leader is demanding $2 million and a helicopter. They've already shot out the cameras. SWAT is 20 minutes out. We need someone NOW."
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Neutralize the armed robbers without hostage casualties
  • Protect the children—they're terrified
  • Move fast—the robbers are getting nervous
